subject: Talladega Superspeedway
lead_paragraph: Dario Franchitti injured his ankle in a crash on the 10th lap of the Nationwide Series race at Talladega, sending him and driver Larry Gunselman to a hospital for observation. Franchitti had qualified for Sunday’s race, but he will be replaced by David Stremme.
